casper
Class Trap implements Physics

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--casper.Trap
public class Trap
extends java.lang.Object

陷阱类,处理各种自动或手动效果伤害.


Example:

Image img;

int[][][] subImage;

int x;

int y;

int width;

int height;

boolean isTime;

int[][] button1;

Product p;

Monster m;

Trap t =new Trap( img, subImage, x,y, width, height, isTime,button1) ;

t.setProduct(p);

t.setMonset(m);

t.setPos(x,y);



Author: wangquan
Version: 1.0

Field Summary
Method Summary
void setPos(int x,int y) 设置位置.
void setProduct(Product p) 设置有效反映的物体.
void setMonster(Monster m) 设置有效反映的怪物.
boolean isCollidingWithProduct() 是否碰撞物体.
void paint(Graphics g) 绘制道具陷阱.
void setButton(int tx,int ty,int tw,int th) 设置开关位置.
void setAction() 动画处理.
void isCollidingWithButton() 是否碰到开关按钮.
void events() 打开陷阱的事件处理.
void setIsTime(boolean isTime) 是计时处理还是受动处理.
boolean isCollidingWithProduct() 与物体的碰撞.
boolean isCollidingWithMonster() 与怪物的碰撞.
boolean isCollidingWithMap(int cellX,int cellY) 与地图的碰撞.
void drawSubImage(Graphics g,int x,int y) 裁减绘制.
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
